message: an Amazing solution for scaling images when generating thumbnails :) i used it today and it's working perfect so i recommend it :)
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: jQuery Image Scale
caption: imgscale.kjmeath.com
description: Automatically scales images to fit or fill their parent container.

data.message: good point but unfortunately we need to support IE6 and max-width is supported there :) beside if you have a big image and you resize it using your way it will work but the photo will look weird in some cases when you have a tall image and you need to resize it as square ex: original photo dimensions: width: 400px height: 800px and the needed size is width: 50px & Height: 50px :)

width:100% will do the trick in IE6 :)

but the tall images issue is the problem here.
I made a good example you can check it here :) http://jsfiddle.net/Malaa/cBJbd/

here is my version, the only difference that the plugin applies -ve top margin to the image (you can do this manually if you want)

http://jsfiddle.net/Gabri/Tk5UC/2/
